headline.print_headline: Pope Praises Azerbaijan’s Religious Tolerance, Avoiding a Touchy Topic
headline.main: Pope Francis Notes Azerbaijan’s Religious Tolerance, Not Rights Abuses

keywords.value: Human Rights and Human Rights Violations
keywords.name: subject

snippet: The pope focused on diplomacy in meetings with leaders of other faiths, and the nation’s president, later expounding on other topics, like advice for American Catholic voters....
lead_paragraph: The pope focused on diplomacy in meetings with leaders of other faiths, and the nation’s president, later expounding on other topics, like advice for American Catholic voters.
